code: function stringToColor(string){var hash=0;for(var i=0;i<string.replace(/\s+/g,"").length;i+=1){hash=string.replace(/\s+/g,"").charCodeAt(i)+((hash<<5)-hash);}var color="#";for(var _i=0;_i<3;_i+=1){var value=hash>>_i*8&0xff;color+="00".concat(value.toString(16)).substr(-2);}return color;}export default function stringAvatar(name){if(name.trim().split(" ").length>1){return{sx:{backgroundColor:stringToColor(name)},children:"".concat(name.split(" ")[0][0]).concat(name.split(" ")[1][0])};}else{return{style:{backgroundColor:stringToColor(name)},children:"".concat(name.split(" ")[0][0])};}}
